text: Let second order auto-regression model defined $$a_0 x_t + a_1 x_{t-1} + a_2 x_{t-2} = w_t, w_t ~ N(0, 1).$$ stationary assumption consider variance \(x_t\) \(t=1,\ldots,n\). assumption gives \(n \times n\) symmetric precision matrix \(Q\) sparse matrix following non-zero elements: \(Q_{1,1} = Q_{n,n} = a_0^2\) \(Q_{2,2} = Q_{n-1,n-1} = a_0^2 + a_1^2\) \(Q_{1,2} = Q_{2,1} = Q_{n-1,n} = Q_{n,n-1} = a_0 a_1\) \(Q_{t,t} = q_0 = a_0^2 + a_1^2 + a_2^2, t = 3, 4, ..., n-2\) \(Q_{t,t-1} = Q_{t-1,t} = q_1 = a_1(a_0 + a_2), t = 3, 4, ..., n-1\) \(Q_{t,t-2} = Q_{t-2,t} = q_2 = a_2 a_0, t = 3, 4, ..., n\)
